lady folk & toed at the blind pig

the joy of being in a band myself is having friends who are also in bands. nothing like getting the crowd riled up for your homies doing their thang.

this was at the legendary blind pig in ann arbor michigan. no flash, all natural, probably could have shot a higher iso. one day i'll get a mini softbox...

shot on canon 5D mkiii
